name: The Pretender Journey
description:
This is a hidden roles, turn-based, card, multiplayer game. It is also playable with a number of players lower than 3. In that case, it becomes a cooperative game with the objective of creating a path from the house to the tower without running out of turns.

Instructions

Move your caracter clicking on the path. Some cards can be applied on the path or over other players or yourself.

Different alternatives for a turn: 

- Move > Apply card > Move 

- Apply card > Move

- Move > Apply Card

Win conditions

Villagers: Create a path from the starting point to the tower. Or defeat all the impostors.

Impostors: End the game due no turns left. Or defeat all the villagers.
